data.text:
Thanks for visiting Finance. We hope you've enjoyed learning about how we protect and nurture MondelÄ“z International financial interests around the world.

We've talked about how we partner with other functions and externally to safeguard the company's assets and help prevent risk, and how we've built our world-class Finance team by focusing on our talented people.

To find out more about what we do here in Finance don't forget to look in the Resources Room.

Select the Home icon to return to the menu.
